title: Garen's E doesn't make a 'crack' sound on 4th tick in 7.1.  Also Ult cancels if vision is lost.
body:
Title.

It worked fine last patch but now there's no sound on the 4th tick.

Also, starting in 6.24 I've noticed Garen's ults being cancelled again by losing vision (Bug was fixed in 4.18 but now it's back).

replies.body: Thanks for report, will look into it!
ulti cancels with vission lost for darius too. kha Q aswell isnt it intented? if it's not FIX FUCKING KHA ZIX.
